oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Communicator newsletter, 1965 May 13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: May 1965 edition of a weekly newsletter published by Chattanooga Public Schools. This particular issue discusses the Avondale Project, a program designed to prepare Chattanooga teachers for desegregation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
